post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Decorating maps can be pretty difficult if you don't want to use the default model props, here's a pretty simple way to create a handrail which is nice for most levels.

http://www.mnemic.tk/education/videotut ... o_tscc.rar

Size:3.42 Mb
Length:2:24 Minutes

post.author: Lord_Calgar445
post.body: any chance you can get someone else to host your vid tutorials because i cant get to your site to download em?

post.author: Motoxpro
post.body: what codec tdo i need to play them?

post.author: Origin73
post.body:
You need the TSCC codec. Here's the link:

http://www.techsmith.com/products/studi ... wnload.asp

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
if anyone would like to host them please let me know, rather contact me via MSN Messenger since I have that on all the time so...

Sorry about bad host, but I get it for free so it's better than nothing, and actually, it works all the time for me, not for everyone else though =(

post.author: DumpTruck
post.body:
Origin73 wrote:
You need the TSCC codec. Here's the link:

http://www.techsmith.com/products/studi ... wnload.asp


Any chance you could encode them in Windows Media - their encoder is free. I cannot install your codec at work.

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Sorry, don't think I can, if someone else would like to re-encode them and host them that's fine, just post it here in the forums and give some credz to me.

I can't pick the Windows Media Codec when I encode cuz it aint there, and I don't wanna record with that program, since it's not too good with 3D. I use it for other VT's though, but not theese kind.
